name: Tauntaun Bones (V)
Lore: 'The bones of a tauntaun represent both death and life: death for the prey, life for the predator. A symbol of the ebb and flow of the Force through all things.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Once per turn, may deploy a creature (except a parasite) or a tauntaun from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Your ferocious creatures are deploy -2 and ferocity +1.  Whenever you retrieve Force because a creature has eaten a card, you need only use X-2 Force for Secret Plans (to a minimum of 1). (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
